title: Soraka Bug in aram
body:
Greetings Summoner,

i just played an aram and had soraka, but her heal just healed for less then 50% of the amount it should heal. I tested it in a botgame after this and it worked just fine. Someoneelse got this kind of bug with her? It was really annoying..  :-/ 
{{champion:16}} {{item:3070}} {{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}} 

So just to let you know, somethign si wrong there. Greets

replies.body: Nope, im ARAM sind Heilungen verringert (Schilde auch?), steht aber in dem speziellen ARAM-Buff!
